description: LangChain is a framework for building applications powered by LLMs, enabling easy integration of models, data, and external tools
init:
val langchain4jMap = mapOf(
    "bedrock" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-bedrock:$v",
    "anthropic" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-anthropic:$v",
    "azure" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-azure-open-ai:$v",
    "googleai" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-google-ai-gemini:$v",
    "vertexai" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-vertex-ai-gemini:$v",
    "huggingface" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-hugging-face:$v",
    "ollama" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-ollama:$v",
    "openai" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-open-ai:$v",
    "openaiofficial" to "dev.langchain4j:langchain4j-open-ai-official:$v"
)
USE {
    dependencies(langchain4jMap["$model"] ?: error("Not recognized dependency '$model'. Use follow models: `bedrock`, `anthropic`, `azure`, `googleai`, `vertexai`, `huggingface`, `ollama`, `openai`, `openaiofficial`"))
    import("dev.langchain4j.model.$model.*")
}
